name: CMGT_PortalInterface_HeaderLayout
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!wideScreen: {
    "TABLET_LANDSCAPE",
    "DESKTOP_NARROW",
    "DESKTOP",
    "DESKTOP_WIDE"
  },
  local!isWide: if(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_isPageWidth"(local!wideScreen),
    true,
    false
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_headerContentLayout"(
    header: {
      rule!CMGT_PortalInterface_BillboardLayout(
        headerBackgroundImage: ri!headerBackgroundImage,
        height: ri!height,
        isWide: local!isWide,
        title: ri!title,
        brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
        description: ri!description,
        secondaryDescription: ri!secondaryDescription,
        headerImage: ri!headerImage,
        showHeader: ri!showHeader
      )
    },
    contents: ri!contents,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.DefaultBackgroundColor
  )
)
